loans.use: to purchase a walking tractor and a trailer.

loans.name: Amarjargal

texts.en:
Amarjargal is 34 years old, married, and has three children, one of whom attends school.  He lives in Western Mongolia. His wife is a door-keeper. He was a herder and in 2010, he moved to the province and started a taxi service. To run the business, he sold his livestock and bought an Excel van. The business is doing very well. 

Amarjargal is requesting a loan for 1,500,000 MNT, which he will use to buy a new van to keep his business successful. Amarjargal is a bright man who would like to expand his business by getting a big van with more seats and more space inside so that he can improve his livelihood and save for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a new van.

loans.name: Biviana

texts.es:
Biviana tiene 50 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta relación tiene cuatro hijos de la cuales tiene dos hijos independientes y dos todavía depende de ella, ella nació en la ciudad de Mararuna de la provincia de La Convención  del departamento del Cusco pero actualmente vive en la hermosa ciudad de Urubamba. Biviana tiene varias actividades económicas como por ejemplo venta de verduras y venta de comestibles, ella tiene una pequeña tienda donde expende sus productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azucar y otras cosas mas. Biviana requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, tarros de leche y gaseosas.  

El banco comunal “Munay Tika” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la provincia de Urubamba  del departamento del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.

El departamento del Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Biviana is 50 years old, married, and the fruit of this relationship is 4 children, 2 of whom are independent and 2 still dependent on her.  Biviana was born in the city of Mararuna, province of La Convencion, department of Cusco, but presently she lives in the beautiful city of Urubamba. Biviana has a variety of economic activities; for example, selling vegetables and groceries. She has a small store where products of primary necessity are sold, including rice, sugar, and other such items. Biviana needs a loan to buy merchandise such as sacks of rice and sugar, bottles of milk, and soft drinks.

The “Munay Tika” communal bank is composed of responsible and hard-working people who are advancing their families. The majority of members live in the province of Urubamba, department of Cusco, where they pursue their economic activities.

Cusco department is famous as a tourist and commercial zone where the traditional Inti Raymi festival is held, and as home to one of the seven marvels of the world, “Machupicchu.”

loans.use: buy merchandise such as rice, sacks of sugar, bottles of milk, and soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es: La señora Maria, es habitante del municpio de Ticuantepe, junto a su familia, los planes hacia su hogar es poder mejorar las condiciones de vida, ya que con el prestamo anterior logro cerrar un cuarto que ahora sus hijos gozan y se siente muy sastifecha, la mayor dificultad que enfrento en este ciclo fue la operación de su pequeño hijo, fue operado de apendicite y esta se logro reventar lo cual provoco serios problemas de salud para su hijo y estuvo hospitalizado por mas de quince dias , esto no le permitio vender  y con solo el sueldo del esposo no podian cubrir todos los gastos del hogar y tres de las cuotas no las dio a tiempo . Esta vez quiere el prestamo para la compra de piedra , arena , hierro , piedrin , etc .
texts.en:
Señora Maria lives in the town of Ticuantepe with her family.  He plans for her household are to be able to improve her living conditions, as with her previous loan she was able to complete a room that her children now enjoy and she feels great satisfaction.  

The biggest difficulty that she has faced in this cycle was her young son's operation: he was operated on for appendicitis.  His appendix burst which caused some serious health problems for her son, and he was hospitalized for more than two weeks.  This meant that she couldn't make any sales and with only her husband's salary, they weren't able to cover all their household expenses, and did not make three of their repayments on time.

This time she wants the loan for the purchase of stone, sand, iron, pebbles, etc.

loans.use: to build a wall.

loans.name: Rufina

texts.es:
Rufina tiene 45 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene cuatro hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Maranura de la provincia de La Convención del departamento del Cusco pero actualmente vive en el asentamiento humano de Cotowincho del distrito de Urubamba. Rufina se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, pollos y patos, ella también se dedica a la venta de frutas que  trae de la zona del valle de La Convención. Rufina en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar frutas.  

El banco comunal “Munay Tika” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la provincia de Urubamba  del departamento del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.

El departamento del Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Rufina is 45 years old and is married; she has four children from this relationship.  She was born in the city of Maranura in the province of La Convención in Cusco department, but she currently lives in the settlement of Cotowincho in Urubamba district.  Rufina works raising small animals, for example guinea-pigs, chickens and turkeys.  She also works selling fruit, which she brings from the La Convención valley.   On this occasion, Rufina is requesting the loan to purchase fruit.

The "Munay Tika" communal bank is made up of responsible and hard-working people who are moving their families ahead in life. The majority of the members live in the province of Urubamba in the department of Cuscco, and this is where they undertake their work activities.

The department of Cusco is known for being an area with much tourism and commerce, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because it's the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to purchase fruit.

loans.name: Simplecia

texts.en:
Simplecia is 54 years old, married, and has two children. She resides in Mantic Tangub City, Philippines. Simplecia owns and operates a retail store, selling a variety of different products to earn a living. She has been in this business for 20 years earning 3,000 PHP a month.  

Simplecia is requesting a loan for 5,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase new items to expand her product offering. In 2012, Simplecia joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, she wants to build a house and  make sure her children receive an education.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand her product offering.

loans.name: Mavluda

texts.ru: мавлюда, одна из передовых девятилетних клиентов организации, которая при помощи кредитов смогла развернуть свой товарооборот. Она раньше торговала детской обувью, а сейчас изменила свой ассортимент.Т.к у нас большим спросом пользуется использование женских платков, она решила продавать косынки и шарфы для женщин. Как она говорит, её торговля наладилась и она стала получать хороший доход. За товаром она ездит два раза  в месяц в Истаравшан. Её муж электрик и его доход вполне хватает на жизнь, а доход Мавлюды они тратят на непредвиденные семейные расходы.Мавлюда смогла сама купить новый телевизор, чему она рада и благодарна сотрудничеству с организацией.
texts.en: Mavluda is one of the leading nine-year clients of our organization, who was able to increase her goods turnover with the help of credits.  She previously sold children's shoes and changed her focus since then.  Because women's scarves are in high demand here, she decided to sell scarves and shawls for women.  As Mavluda says, her sales improved, and she started to earn a good income.  She travels for merchandise to Istaravshan twice per month.  Her husband is an electrician, and his income is quite sufficient for living, and they spend Mavluda's income on unexpected family expenses.  Mavluda was able to buy a new television herself, and she is happy and grateful for the partnership with the organization.

loans.use: to purchase a new variety of shawls and scarves

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy perfume to sell.

loans.name: 03.03.02 Quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Tú is 31 years old, married, and has two children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa City, a semi-urban area in Thanh Hoa province. She raises poultry and cattle, which she has been doing for five years. 

Tú is requesting a loan to purchase poultry and cattle to raise. The main hardship that Tú faces in her business is the lack of capital. With her profit, Tú hopes to expand her business and to build a new house.

Tú is the group leader of the 03.3.02 Quảng Hưng group, which consists of four members. In 2011, Tú joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. She has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

loans.use: to purchase poultry and cattle.

loans.name: Marcosa

texts.es:
Marcosa tiene 48 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene seis hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Urubamba de la provincia de Urubamba del  departamento del Cusco pero actualmente vive en el asentamiento de Cotowincho del distrito de Urubamba. Marcosa se dedica a la venta de chicha de jora en su domicilio los días lunes, martes y sábados, ella también se dedica a la venta de papa. Marcosa en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar maíz y papa.  

El banco comunal “Munay Tika” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la provincia de Urubamba  del departamento del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.

El departamento del Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Marcosa is 48 years old, married, and has six children from her marriage.  She was born in the city of Urubamba, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department but she currently lives in Cotowincho, in Urubamba district.  Marcosa's business is selling 'chicha de jora' (a traditional, corn-based drink).  She does this from her home on Mondays, Tuesdays and Saturdays.  She also sells potatoes.  On this occasion, she needs a loan to buy corn and potatoes.

The 'Munay Tika' community bank is made up of responsible and hard-working people who provide for their families.  Most of the members live in Urubamba province, in Cusco department, and this is where they carry out their businesses.

Cusco department is a very well-known tourist spot.  It is known for its traditional Inti Raymi festival and because it is home to one of the seven wonders of the world, 'Machu Picchu'.

loans.use: to buy corn and potatoes

loans.name: Eulogia

texts.es:
Eulogia tiene 37 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella nació en la ciudad Maranura de la provincia de La Convención del departamento del Cusco pero actualmente vive en el asentamiento de Cotowincho del distrito de Urubamba del departamento del Cusco. Eulogia se dedica a la venta de fruta que trae del valle de La Convención como por ejemplo mandarina, piña, plátanos, naranjas y otras especies más. Eulogia en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar frutas.  Su sueño de Eulogia es abrir una distribuidora de balones de gas.  

El banco comunal “Munay Tika” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la provincia de Urubamba  del departamento del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.

El departamento del Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Eulogia is 37 years old, lives with her common-law husband, and has two children.  She was born in the town of Maranura, in La Convención province, in Cusco department but currently lives in Cotowincho, in Urubamba district, in Cusco department.  Eulogia's business is selling fruit which she brings from La Convención valley such as mandarins, pineapples, bananas and oranges.  On this occasion, she needs a loan to buy fruit.  Her dream is to open a wholesaler's selling gas cylinders.

The 'Munay Tika' community bank is made up of responsible and hard-working people who provide for their families.  Most of the members live in Urubamba province, in Cusco department, and this is where they carry out their businesses.

Cusco department is a very well-known tourist spot.  It is known for its traditional Inti Raymi festival and because it is home to one of the seven wonders of the world, 'Machu Picchu'.

loans.use: to buy fruit

loans.name: Bokk Jom Ak Jam Group

texts.fr:
le groupe de solidarité Bokk jom ak jam existe depuis le 9 juillet 2011, il est composé de quinze femmes qui habitent le quartier et évoluent dans le même Groupement de Promotion Féminin; elles font du petit commerce.
Pourméra la responsable est âgée de 34 ans, elle est célibataire mère de trois enfants et a deux autres en charge(son neveu et sa nièce)

Elle mène une activité de petit commerce de parfum, crème de beauté et encens "thiouraye" avec une bonne expérience de plus de dix ans.Elle est debout devant habillée en taille basse et a levé la main gauche.


Son prêt lui servira à augmenter les produits à vendre afin d'espérer gagner beaucoup de revenus.

Elle souhaite avec les bénéfices attendus renforcer son activité, épargner et appuyer sa famille dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The solidarity group Bokk Jom Ak Jam has existed since July 9th, 2011. It is composed of 15 women who live in the same district, are all small retailers and part of the same "Groupement de Promotion Féminin" (a group for the promotion of women).

The group's leader is Pourméra. She is 34 years old, single and the mother of 3 children. She is also responsible for 2 more children (her nephew and niece). She is an experienced trader who has been selling perfumes, beauty creams and "thiouraye" incense for over 10 years. She is standing at the front of the picture, wearing the dress with a dropped waist and holding up her left hand.

Pourméra will use her part of the loan to restock on products for resale in the hopes of generating a lot of revenue. She would like to use her expected profits to strengthen her business, build up her savings and support her family with the daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy incense and perfume for resale.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia tiene 28 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene dos hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Maranura de la provincia de La Convención del departamento del Cusco pero actualmente vive en el asentamiento humano de Cotowincho del distrito de Urubamba de la provincia de Urubamba del departamento del Cusco. Sonia es profesora y enseña en uno de los centros educativos prestigiosos de la ciudad de Urubamba, ella enseña el nivel inicial y la podemos encontrar trabajando desde las ochos de la mañana hasta la una de la tarde. En esta oportunidad Sonia requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de su casa. 

El banco comunal “Munay Tika” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la provincia de Urubamba  del departamento del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.

El departamento del Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Sonia, 28, is married and has two children from this beautiful relationship. She was born in the city of Maranuar in La Convención Province in Cusco Department but now lives in the settlement of Cotowincho in Urubamba District in Urubamba District in Cusco Department. Sonia is a teacher and teaches in one of the prestigious educational centers in the city of Urubamba. She teaches at the beginning level and we can find her working from 8 in the morning until 1 in the afternoon. At this time Sonia needs a loan to do maintenance on her house.

The Munay Tika Communal Bank is made up of responsible and hardworking people who are moving their families forward. A majority of the members live in Urubamba Province in Cusco Department where they conduct their economic activities.

Cusco Department is known as a highly commercial tourist zone and for its traditional Inti Raymi celebration and because Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world, is found here,

loans.use: to do maintenance on her house.

loans.name: Zjarkinboy

texts.ru: Жаркинбой парень, который проживает в сельской местности и занимается откормом скота. Он также работает на стройке. но из-за обильного снегопада, он временно не работает и поэтому хочет увеличить численность скота. У него несколько десятков коз, с которых он имеет дополнительный доход с продажи их шерсти.Он сам стрижёт их и продаёт шерсть , местным женщинам , которые производят пряжу и отправляют в Россию. Для увеличения численности коз Жаркинбой решил получить кредит.
texts.en: Zjarkinboy is a young man, who lives in a rural area and is involved in fattening up livestock.  He also works at a construction site, but due to heavy snowfall, he is temporarily unemployed, and this is why he wants to increase livestock quantity.  He has several tens of goats, with which he earns an additional income from sales of their wool.  Zjarkinboy shaves them himself and sells the wool to the local women, who then make yarn and send it to Russia.  Zjarkinboy decided to obtain this loan to increase the quantity of goats.

loans.use: to purchase goats

loans.name: Mariama

texts.fr: Madame Mariama habite au Sénégal. Elle est mariée et mère de 2 enfants. Elle est âgée  de 27 ans et évolue depuis 3 ans dans le commerce et la vente de tissus de cérémonie sur commande. C’est après son mariage qu’elle a choisi cette activité dans le but de se procurer des revenus. Elle  est sociétaire d’un guichet de l’U-IMCEC depuis aout 2011 et n’a jamais bénéficié de crédit dans la dite institution. Elle sollicite un prêt de 400 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de tissus qui seront destinés a la vente.
texts.en:
Mariama lives in Senegal. She is 27 years old, married and mother to 2 children. She has been working as a small retailer for 3 years and sells ceremonial fabrics to order. She chose this line of work after getting married, with the aim of earning an income.

Mariama has been a member of a UIMCEC branch since August 2011 and has not previously benefited from a loan from the institution. She is now requesting a loan of 400 000 francs which she plans to use to buy fabric for resale.

loans.use: to buy fabric for resale.
